datetime_iso_now.label: Actual date and time
datetime_iso_now.description: A placeholder for the actual date and time in ISO format (YYYY-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.sssZ). The value will be updated if the card reloads.

date_iso_today.label: Actual date
date_iso_today.description: A placeholder for the actual date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-dd). The value will be updated if the card reloads.

string_locale_underscore.label: Currently used language and region
string_locale_underscore.description: A placeholder for the current language based on the user settings in the format language_region (en_US)

string_locale_dash.label: Currently used language and region
string_locale_dash.description: A placeholder for the current language based on the user settings in the format language-region (en-US).
